review:
Pros:
Very good movie. 
Crisp runtime. 
Exceptional performances from lead actors. 
Surprising twists.
A murder mystery should keep you hooked till end & this movie does achieves it.

Cons:
Logic loopholes (Like what did the police department do when 5 murders had happened. Whom was kedar suspecting? Did he or the department investigate or not?) 
The decoy plot (except for an explanation in the end, was not well used)
Except for Sanjay and Satam all other policemen were shown in poor light.

Pros:
Very good movie. 
Crisp runtime. 
Exceptional performances from lead actors. 
Surprising twists.
A murder mystery should keep you hooked till end & this movie does achieves it.

Cons:
Logic loopholes (Like what did the police department do when 5 murders had happened. Whom was kedar suspecting? Did he or the department investigate or not?) 
The decoy plot (except for an explanation in the end, was not well used)
Except for Sanjay and Satam all other policemen were shown in poor light.

Given the shorter runtime & performance of Sanjay (KK Menon), this movie is definitely worth watching!!

Very good. The plot, the acting and the cinematography were superb. K K menon never fails to deliver. He is one of India's best thespians. If one did not know, it could easily be mistaken for a top grade Hollywood movie! First class. Congratulations to all!

Excellent Movie. Everybody acted very well in the movie. Songs and BGM in the movie were not so good. The movie was so interesting and thrilling. Not even a single scene was boring. The movie was not so lengthy and lagging which was a main highlight of the movie. There were no unwanted scenes and the movie concentrated more on thrilling and investigating scenes that made the movie more interesting and thrilling. The movie was not boring at all. The lead actors rocked the movie by their performan ...MORE

Excellent Movie. Everybody acted very well in the movie. Songs and BGM in the movie were not so good. The movie was so interesting and thrilling. Not even a single scene was boring. The movie was not so lengthy and lagging which was a main highlight of the movie. There were no unwanted scenes and the movie concentrated more on thrilling and investigating scenes that made the movie more interesting and thrilling. The movie was not boring at all. The lead actors rocked the movie by their performance. One of the best thriller movies. Excellent Movie.
Movie is unpopular and underrated like other movies of K K Menon. Rahasya was also a good movie like this. It's a suspense film and based on true events. It could be a little better. I give 7/10.
Perhaps the best ever thriller underrated movie. I wish there would be more movies like this one in the future.
